WorkItem.Description:
Per subject line

Readiness     :    2
SerpentSting  :   16

SteadyShot    :  156
 
Same character, default MM spec

Readiness     :    2
SerpentSting  :    1
ChimearaShot  :   36
KillShot      :    5
AimedShot     :   36
SilencingShot :   19
SteadyShot    :  134
 
Same character, default BM spec
RapidFire     :    2
Readiness     :    0
SerpentSting  :   22
KillShot      :    8
SteadyShot    :  195
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Survival shot rotations not being calculated
